title: Turn of century Litho - Hand drawn
content:
Greetings!

I'm trying to recreate the feel of this and was wondering if anyone could suggest some similars.

Many thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Tenichi Troupe.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200207/http:/typophile.com/files/Tenichi%20Troupe.jpg) | 116.2 KB |
author: malbright

comments.content:
Having a look to " [Art Nouveau](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200207/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/art+nouveau)" and " [Art Deco](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200207/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/art+deco)" could be helpful. There are also [Scriptorium's](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200207/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Scriptorium/), [Solotype's](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200207/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Solotype/), [HiH](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200207/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/HiH/) and [Greater Albion Typefounders](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200207/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Greater_Albion_Typefounders/) catalogues.  
Some: [Goodfellow](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200207/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/goodfellow/), [Quaint Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200207/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/quaint-gothic-sg/), [Art Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200207/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/art-gothic-hih/)
